import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { instituteAPI, reviewAPI, userAPI } from '../../services/api'; import './HomePage.css'; const HomePage = () => { const [featuredInstitutes, setFeaturedInstitutes] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ institutes: 0, reviews: 0, students: 0, cities: 0 }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetchHomePageData(); }, []); const fetchHomePageData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const [institutesRes, reviewsRes, usersRes] = await Promise.all([ instituteAPI.getAll(), reviewAPI.getAll(), userAPI.getAll() ]); const institutes = institutesRes.data; const reviews = reviewsRes.data; const users = usersRes.data; // Calculate dynamic stats const uniqueCities = new Set(institutes.map(inst => inst.city)).size; const studentUsers = users.filter(user => user.role === 'user').length; setStats({ institutes: institutes.length, reviews: reviews.length, students: studentUsers, cities: uniqueCities }); // Get featured institutes (approved institutes with highest ratings) const approvedInstitutes = institutes.filter(inst => inst.status === 'approved'); const featured = approvedInstitutes .sort((a, b) => { // Sort by rating (you can implement rating logic later) return Math.random() - 0.5; // Random for now }) .slice(0, 6); setFeaturedInstitutes(featured); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching homepage data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const categories = [ { name: 'Schools', icon: 'ðŸ«', count: featuredInstitutes.filter(inst => inst.category === 'School').length }, { name: 'Colleges', icon: 'ðŸŽ“', count: featuredInstitutes.filter(inst => inst.category === 'College').length }, { name: 'Universities', icon: 'ðŸ“š', count: featuredInstitutes.filter(inst => inst.category === 'University').length }, { name: 'Coaching Centers', icon: 'âœï¸', count: featuredInstitutes.filter(inst => inst.category === 'Coaching Center').length } ]; const getInstituteBadgeColor = (category) => { const colors = { 'School': '#ff6b6b', 'College': '#4ecdc4', 'University': '#45b7d1', 'Coaching Center': '#96ceb4', 'Preschool': '#feca57' }; return colors[category] || '#667eea'; }; if (loading) { return (
